name: Forgotten Adventure
description: A forgotten adventure is a game about a nice little man. Somehow our hero forgot the road, he was lost and got into an enchanted place. And now, he is looking for his way, overcoming traps, dangers and various obstacles. Every time he falls into a trap, everything starts with a new one.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 duo + Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
